verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician עַלְמ֥וּת [T'al-Mut לַבֵּ֗ן <WH4192> lab-Ben, death מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> o-Deh I will praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh [thee] O LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib-Bi; with my whole heart אֲ֝סַפְּרָ֗ה <WH5608> 'a-sap-pe-Rah, I will shew forth כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha. all thy marvellous works

אֶשְׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8055> 'es-me-Chah I will be glad וְאֶעֶלְצָ֣ה <WH5970> ve-'e-'el-Tzah and rejoice בָ֑ךְ Vach; אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-Rah in thee I will sing praise שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha to thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. O thou most High

בְּשׁוּב־ <WH7725> be-shuv- are turned אוֹיְבַ֥י <WH341> 'oy-Vai When mine enemies אָח֑וֹר <WH268> a-Chor; back יִכָּשְׁל֥וּ <WH3782> yik-ka-she-Lu they shall fall וְ֝יֹאבְד֗וּ <WH6> ve-yoe-Du, and perish מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nei-cha. at thy presence

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָ֭שִׂיתָ <WH6213> 'A-si-ta For thou hast maintained מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <WH4941> mish-pa-Ti my right וְדִינִ֑י <WH1779> ve-di-Ni; and my cause יָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <WH3427> ya-Shav-ta thou satest לְ֝כִסֵּ֗א <WH3678> le-chis-Se, in the throne שׁוֹפֵ֥ט <WH8199> sho-Fet judging צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> Tze-dek. right

גָּעַ֣רְתָּ <WH1605> ga-'Ar-ta Thou hast rebuked ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> Go-yim the heathen אִבַּ֣דְתָּ <WH6> 'ib-Bad-ta thou hast destroyed רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; the wicked שְׁמָ֥ם <WH8034> she-Mam their name מָ֝חִ֗יתָ <WH4229> ma-Chi-ta, thou hast put out לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> va-'Ed. and ever

הָֽאוֹיֵ֨ב׀ <WH341> ha-'o-Yev O thou enemy תַּ֥מּוּ <WH8552> Tam-mu end חֳרָב֗וֹת <WH2723> cho-ra-Vot, destructions לָ֫נֶ֥צַח <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach are come to a perpetual וְעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> ve-'a-Rim the cities נָתַ֑שְׁתָּ <WH5428> na-Tash-ta; and thou hast destroyed אָבַ֖ד <WH6> 'a-Vad is perished זִכְרָ֣ם <WH2143> zich-Ram their memorial הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. with them

וַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh But the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever יֵשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> ye-Shev; shall endure כּוֹנֵ֖ן <WH3559> ko-Nen he hath prepared לַמִּשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> lam-mish-Pat for judgment כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <WH3678> kis-'O. his throne

וְה֗וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu, and He יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <WH8199> yish-pot- And he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> te-Vel the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> be-Tze-dek; in righteousness יָדִ֥ין <WH1777> ya-Din he shall minister judgment לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> le-'um-Mim, to the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> be-mei-sha-Rim. in uprightness

וִ֘יהִ֤י <WH1961> vi-Hi become יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH4869> mis-Gav also will be a refuge לַדָּ֑ךְ <WH1790> lad-Dach; for the oppressed מִ֝שְׂגָּ֗ב <WH4869> mis-Gav, a refuge לְעִתּ֥וֹת <WH6256> le-'it-Tot in times בַּצָּרָֽה׃ <WH6869> batz-tza-Rah. of trouble

וְיִבְטְח֣וּ <WH982> ve-yiv-te-Chu will put their trust בְ֭ךָ Ve-cha יוֹדְעֵ֣י <WH3045> yod-'Ei And they that know שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha; thy name כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- have not עָזַ֖בְתָּ <WH5800> 'a-Zav-ta hast not forsaken דֹרְשֶׁ֣יךָ <WH1875> do-re-Shei-cha them that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. in thee for thou LORD

זַמְּר֗וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru, Sing praises לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh to the LORD יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelleth צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon; in Zion הַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> hag-Gi-du declare בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> va-'am-Mim, among the people עֲלִֽילוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5949> a-Li-lo-Tav. his doings

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for דֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> do-Resh When he maketh inquisition דָּ֭מִים <WH1818> Da-mim for blood אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> o-Tam זָכָ֑ר <WH2142> za-Char; he remembereth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo-Sha- does not שָׁ֝כַ֗ח <WH7911> Chach, them he forgetteth צַעֲקַ֥ת <WH6818> tza-'a-Kat not the cry; עֲנִיִּים 'a-ni-yim כעֲנָוִֽים׃ <WH6041> 'a-na-Vim. afflicted ק

חָֽנְנֵ֬נִי <WH2603> cha-ne-Ne-ni Have mercy יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon me O LORD רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> re-'Eh consider עָ֭נְיִי <WH6040> 'A-ne-yi my trouble מִשֹּׂנְאָ֑י <WH8130> mis-so-ne-'Ai; [which I suffer] of them that hate מְ֝רוֹמְמִ֗י <WH7311> me-rom-Mi, me thou that liftest me up מִשַּׁ֥עֲרֵי <WH8179> mish-Sha-'a-rei from the gates מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> Ma-vet. of death

לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה <WH5608> 'a-sap-pe-Rah, That I may shew forth כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- of all תְּהִלָּ֫תֶ֥יךָ <WH8416> te-hil-La-Tei-cha all thy praise בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> be-sha-'a-Rei in the gates בַת־ <WH1323> vat- of the daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon; of Zion אָ֝גִ֗ילָה <WH1523> 'a-Gi-lah, I will rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> bi-shu-'a-Te-cha. in thy salvation

טָבְע֣וּ <WH2883> ta-ve-'U are sunk down ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> Go-yim The heathen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <WH7845> be-Sha-chat in the pit עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su; [that] they made בְּרֶֽשֶׁת־ <WH7568> be-re-shet- in the net ז֥וּ <WH2098> zu which טָ֝מָ֗נוּ <WH2934> ta-Ma-nu, they hid נִלְכְּדָ֥ה <WH3920> nil-ke-Dah taken רַגְלָֽם׃ <WH7272> rag-Lam. is their own foot

נ֤וֹדַ֨ע׀ <WH3045> no-Da' is known יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <WH4941> mish-Pat [by] the judgment עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah [which] he executeth בְּפֹ֣עַל <WH6467> be-Fo-'al in the work כַּ֭פָּיו <WH3709> Kap-pav of his own hands נוֹקֵ֣שׁ <WH5367> no-Kesh is snared רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; the wicked הִגָּי֥וֹן <WH1902> hig-ga-Yon Higgaion סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> ya-Shu-vu shall be turned רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im The wicked לִשְׁא֑וֹלָה <WH7585> lish-'o-lah; into hell כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> go-Yim, [and] all the nations שְׁכֵחֵ֥י <WH7913> she-che-Chei that forget אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. God

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo will not לָ֭נֶצַח <WH5331> La-ne-tzach shall not alway יִשָּׁכַ֣ח <WH7911> yish-sha-Chach be forgotten אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> ev-Yon; For the needy תִּקְוַ֥ת <WH8615> tik-Vat the expectation; עֲנָוִים 'a-na-vim כעֲ֝נִיִּ֗ים <WH6035> 'a-ni-Yim, humble קתֹּאבַ֥ד <WH6> to-Vad shall [not] perish לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> la-'Ad. for ever

קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> ku-Mah Arise יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יָעֹ֣ז <WH5810> ya-'Oz prevail אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH376> e-Noosh; he יִשָּׁפְט֥וּ <WH8199> yish-sha-fe-Tu be judged ג֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> go-Yim, let the heathen עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha. in thy sight

שִׁ֘יתָ֤ה <WH7896> shi-Tah Put יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3069> Yah-weh God מוֹרָ֗ה <WH4172> mo-Rah, dread לָ֫הֶ֥ם <WH1992> la-Hem like יֵדְע֥וּ <WH3045> ye-de-'U may know גוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> go-Yim; [that] the nations אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh themselves [to be but] men הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah
